title: [Extension Proposal] Pretty Time NLP

labels.name: area/quarkiverse
labels.description: This issue/PR is part of the Quarkiverse organization

body:
### Description

PrettyTime :: NLP is an OpenSource, Java Library – enabling simple parsing and computer understanding of natural language, and social date references like, “let’s go to dinner at 6,” or “I’ll be on vacation for three days”.

This extension would allow you to use this library in Quarkus native applications.

The extension provides a singleton `org.ocpsoft.prettytime.PrettyTimeParser` in the same fashion as https://github.com/quarkiverse/quarkus-prettytime provides a singleton `org.ocpsoft.prettytime.PrettyTime`.

The extension is already implemented here: https://github.com/joes/quarkus-prettytime-nlp

Interested in this extension, please +1 via the emoji/reaction feature of GitHub (top right).

### Repository name

quarkus-prettytime-nlp

### Short description

Quarkus extension providing org.ocpsoft.prettytime.PrettyTimeParser for parsing and computer understanding of natural language, and social date references

### Repository Homepage URL

https://quarkiverse.github.io/quarkiverse-docs/quarkus-prettytime-nlp/dev/

### Repository Topics

- quarkus-extension
- date
- nlp
- social-date-reference


### Team Members

- @joes

### GitHub Applications?

- [X] [Stale](https://github.com/marketplace/stale) - Automatically close stale Issues and Pull Requests that tend to accumulate during a project

### Additional context

_No response_
